name: Salvo Property Group
tag_list: salvo-property-group, salvo-property-group-precinct, salvo-property-group-fdg-rentals, salvo-property-group-fdg-vic, salvo-real-estate, salvo-homes
overview:
The Salvo Property Group is a proprietary limited real estate development company in Australia that holds nine buildings in the country, specifically Melbourne.

Melbourne is the centre and the hub of Australia’s metropolitan area and is the second most populous city in Australia. Gearing towards a more efficient, modernized way of life, the city is continuously developing in terms of investments, commerce and technology.

Running in the real estate business for over thirty years, the company is known for its ability to bring forth state of the art designs and finding prime locations that are fit for the middle to upper class Australian Lifestyle.

The Salvo Property Group is owned and manage by Mario Salvo, one of Australia’s most recognized entrepreneurs. He was granted the National Australia Bank Ethnic Business Man of the year award in 2000 for his efforts and distinguished career in the field of property development.

Over the years, the company is true to their mission of upholding the best staff, consultants and builders in order to provide unique and sophisticated residential, commercial and retail developments that help build Australia’s thriving society.
